properties.entry: SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT WHERE A_PRICE = 0 ORDER BY S_DATE

SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY E_DATE

SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY A_PRICE DESC, T_PRICE DESC
